review_text: Really great display, all the usual Apple features , camera, speakers , controls , etc all excellent. I'm jumping from a 12 year old version and this is amazing. I put on a tempered glass screen protector because my old one had few "gray hairs" crack lines from being dropped a few times . Loving it! Read more
